title: How to find the royalty free music for my YouTube videos - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, there are some producers giving their music to be use for free in exchange for the credit with links as a promotion. You can use my music, by the way! haha You can download my songs from soundcloud and they wont have any issues with copyrights infringement (the instrumental ones) (Dont forget to share my social media links :D) ——————— Music by CHOBED Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/chobed Youtube: http://youtube.com/chobed Instagram: http://instagram.com/chobed
Brother Search NCS on youtoob and U will find there thousands edm tracks . NCS stands for no copyright sounds but, don't forget to give credit to the artist. See the description of the videos
